attributes.action: Save Radcliffe day centre in pudsey leeds
attributes.additional_details: Leeds City council hold a board meeting in June to decide the fate of the elderly in Leeds and staff
attributes.background: Save Radcliffe day centre for older people in pudsey leeds from closure. This is a life line to many and the only social interaction they have.  leeds council need to save money and it's always the elderly that have to suffer at there expense.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Leeds City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://democracy.leeds.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
